We would like to have the ads in 1863992887470977025 approved

To help you with the approval of your ads, could you please provide more details? Specifically, let me know if your account is new and if it has been verified. If your ad is pending due to it being a new account and not being verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
We are allowed to use this celebrity in the ads. The product we promote is created/endorsed by her. We have provided documentation in the past about that.

Thank you for providing the documentation regarding the celebrity endorsement. If your ads are still pending approval, it might be due to other verification issues. Please ensure that your account is fully verified. If you haven't done so already, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
